io.janusproject.services.executor

Interface JanusFutureTask<V>

  • Type Parameters:
    V - the type of the returned value.
    All Superinterfaces:
    Future<V>, Runnable, RunnableFuture<V>

    public interface JanusFutureTask<V>
extends RunnableFuture<V>
    A FutureTask that is Runnable. Successful execution of the run method causes completion of the Future and allows access to its results.
    Version:
    2.0.3.0 2015-11-30 17:37:13
    Author:
    Stéphane Galland
    See Also:
    FutureTask
    Maven Group Id:
    io.janusproject
    Maven Artifact Id:
    io.janusproject.kernel

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Thread getThread()
      Replies the thread that is running the task associated to this future.
      boolean isCurrentThread()
      Replies the task associated to this future is running on the calling thread.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.util.concurrent.RunnableFuture

        run

      • Methods inherited from interface java.util.concurrent.Future

        cancel, get, get, isCancelled, isDone

    • Method Detail

      • getThread

        Thread getThread()
        Replies the thread that is running the task associated to this future.
        Returns:
        the thread, never null.

      • isCurrentThread

        boolean isCurrentThread()
        Replies the task associated to this future is running on the calling thread.
        Returns:
        true if the current thread is running the associated task, false otherwie.
